movie_title: The history of coffee shops - 6 Minute English
introduction: Improve your English vocabulary and speaking in just six minutes! How different are cafes of the 21s

vocabulary.definition: a discussion that a lot of people take part in
vocabulary.example: I took part in a number of stimulating debates at school.
It's hard to have a stimulating conversation with someone who's looking at their phone all the time.

vocabulary.definition: to eat, drink, or use something
vocabulary.example: My car consumes a lot of petrol.

vocabulary.definition: the mood or atmosphere in a place
vocabulary.example: Oxford is a city but it has a small-town vibe.

vocabulary.definition: someone who lives in an empty building without paying rent
vocabulary.example: I lived in a squat for two years.

vocabulary.definition: to use all or most of something in a selfish way
vocabulary.example: Rob! You've hogged the only comfy chair! That is so selfish!
